name: Vampire Stakes
description:
A little multiplayer game made for the 2 button jam. The objective is to kill Vampire to hurt your opponent , the last player standing alive is the winner.

Programmation : Pordrack

Graphism : Omega

Language and library used : Love2D with the classic library.

Tunnels , by foolboy media

Mega Hyper Ultrastorm Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Sound effectes come from  The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection , by Subspace audio.
